name: Chains of Light
components: V, S, F (a length of fine golden chain)
text: A creature targeted by this spell is held immobile by glowing golden chains composed of pure light. The creature is paralyzed and held in place, but may attempt a new saving throw each round to end the effect. While held by the golden chains, a creature cannot use any sort of extradimensional travel, such as astral projection, blink, dimension door, ethereal jaunt, etherealness, gate, maze, plane shift, shadow walk, teleport, and similar spells and spell-like abilities. The spell does not affect creatures that are already in ethereal or astral form when the spell is cast.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材 (一段精巧的金链条)
text_zh: 被该法术命中的生物立刻被光构成的黄金锁链缠绕。该生物被麻痹并困住，但每轮可以尝试新的豁免。当被困住时生物无法尝试任何超空间移动，如星界投影，闪现，任意门，幻化灵体（Ethereal Jaunt），同游灵界（Etherealness），异界之门，迷宫术，位面传送，行影术（shadow walk），传送术和类似法术与类法术能力。该法术不影响在施放时已经处在灵体或星界形态的生物。
